It is a beautiful Saturday morning as you stir from your slumber. You awake to the powerful earthquake in your stomach, craving something very filling. Getting up and getting dressed, you walk into the kitchen to scrounge up some food... only to find the kitchen bare.

"Well, this won't do. I'm starving." you groan. You look out the window to see and man scarff down a young nude woman. In this world, people can swallow large prey, like if their jaws are made of rubber. The ability is common, but at a ratio of 3 to 1 don't have this ability, which makes looking for prey very easy. You have this ability, and watching the frame of the young woman slide down the man's throat into his awaiting stomach, your stomach roars, demanding food.

You scratch you chin, "Hmm... maybe I can do just that! But hunting isn't always very easy, especially with unwilling victims. I wonder if their is an easier way to do this..." In the meantime, you make yourself a cup of coffee and look at the paper. On the "Food and Dining" page, you see a number of places to go for eating out, and an idea pops into your head. "Say... If I go to one of these places... I can be fed to my heart's desire! But which one...?"

You choose...

info.description:
Your name is Kyzer (or just Kyz), and you live in a world where people can swallow prey as large as themselves. You have this awesome ability, making anyone who crosses you path a meal ticket. You hear that some places serve willing and not-willing prey as their main item. Interested, you search out for them, but watch out, someone might do the same to you if you're not careful.

This story is mostly M/f, but I will allow some F/m moments (only if its you who is getting eaten). Keep it soft vore, no blood, except the occasional tooth nick, and you can have some fun with your prey (it's legal), but try not to go overboard, since it's happened in the past and it drives me nuts. Also, be clean with spelling and grammer.

Thanks and happy hunting.
